metadata.Title: CVE-2020-27828 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
There's a flaw in jasper's jpc encoder in versions prior to 2.0.23. Craftedinput provided to jasper by an attacker could cause an arbitraryout-of-bounds write. This could potentially affect data confidentiality,integrity, or application availability.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-27828` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjasper-runtime - 1.900.1-debian1-2.4ubuntu1.3
libjasper1 - 1.900.1-debian1-2.4ubuntu1.3
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: jasper package in esm-infra/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.900.1-debian1-2.4ubuntu1.3').
